page.title: 05BISHOP AUCKLAND - TRANSPORT
page.content: We have a railway station in {Bishop {Auckland.}The only trains that come into it are from {Darlington.}The cost is 90p. A new{bus station }was opened on 10.5.84. There are 6 bus companies using it. The first bus comes from Tow Law at 5.20a.m.The last bus comes from Tow law at 12.15a.m.Lots of buses take tours abroad.In our school, we talked to a bus driver who told us where he changed buses.It was the {United}bus he was going to drive.In our school 62% of the families have a car.The {most popular make}is {Ford.}The most popular foreign makes are {Japanese.} Most cars were 1300cc to 1600cc, probably because of the cost of petrol (Â£2.04). We have not got a car but my dad can drive.He has a tandem instead.A tandem is a bike for two people.I used to go to school on the back of it.It is very nice.
